title: The Power of Visual Storytelling
description:
The Power of Visual Storytelling: How to Use Visuals, Videos, and Social Media to Market Your Brand by Ekaterina Walter, Jessica Gioglio
Requirements: PDF Reader, 7.5 MB
Overview: Attention is the new commodity. Visual Storytelling is the new currency.
Human brain processes visuals 60,000x faster than text.
Web posts with visuals drive up to 180% more engagement than those without.
Viewers spend 100% more time on web pages with videos
